Statement.Details: Declare @sns as varchar(128) set @sns = ? select * from user where sns = @sns
Declare @sns as varchar(128) Declare @id as varchar(128) set @sns = ? set @id = ? select * from feed where sns = @sns and id = @id

INSERT OR REPLACE INTO Feed (id, SNS, feed_from_name, feed_from_id, feed_from_img, msg, story, pic, pic_large, link, name, caption, description, source, icon, annotation, type, created_time, updated_time, isread, isliked, cnt_likes, cnt_comments, cnt_share) values ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
